summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Norman Street and Dearborn Street, each from 31st Avenue South to 32nd Avenue SOuth; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8280 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
